title: False banned!!!!!!!!!!
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
UnskiIIed Feeder: top
UnskiIIed Feeder: top
UnskiIIed Feeder: top
In-Game
UnskiIIed Feeder: ur toxic
UnskiIIed Feeder: banned :D
UnskiIIed Feeder: everyone report kayn he said "kys"
UnskiIIed Feeder: kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: you cant report somebody
UnskiIIed Feeder: for not leashing
UnskiIIed Feeder: kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: enjoy your honor level 0 and 14 days without playing league :F
UnskiIIed Feeder: you sure?
UnskiIIed Feeder: nah
UnskiIIed Feeder: not for so long
UnskiIIed Feeder: i will
UnskiIIed Feeder: if you report kayn for saying the "k phrase"
UnskiIIed Feeder: good
UnskiIIed Feeder: gold
UnskiIIed Feeder: u are kidding XD
UnskiIIed Feeder: never using my w to secure kills ever again
UnskiIIed Feeder: does 0 damage
UnskiIIed Feeder: but i was in w
UnskiIIed Feeder: hello?
UnskiIIed Feeder: they cant cc
UnskiIIed Feeder: shut up
UnskiIIed Feeder: im gold but if i were to play this champ in ranked i d be bronze
UnskiIIed Feeder: thats not ok
UnskiIIed Feeder: what you done
UnskiIIed Feeder: wasnt talking to you
UnskiIIed Feeder: i will
UnskiIIed Feeder: LOL
UnskiIIed Feeder: no he is not
UnskiIIed Feeder: what is that cc
UnskiIIed Feeder: because they nerfed crit?
UnskiIIed Feeder: ?
UnskiIIed Feeder: if you did damage,,,
UnskiIIed Feeder: gg
UnskiIIed Feeder: wp
UnskiIIed Feeder: you gotta fight 4v5 but we gotta fight 2v5
UnskiIIed Feeder: gg
Post-Game
UnskiIIed Feeder: report riven and kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: kayn said kys
UnskiIIed Feeder: our kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: he s a douche
UnskiIIed Feeder: so what?
UnskiIIed Feeder: if its normals you are albe to say "kys" to a random person and not getting banned 14 days?
UnskiIIed Feeder: able
UnskiIIed Feeder: no you are not
UnskiIIed Feeder: sorry kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: :)




SO I GOT BANNED FOR THIS?????? WHAT THE ACTUAL **** DID I SAY WRONG? If im not getting my account unbanned right now im gonna quit this shit game that doesnt allow me to play just because i did what? And btw kayn said "kys" and "kill yourself" several times.



Edit: So i guess riot doesn't like players who are not toxic and that are respecting the summoner's code and encouraging others to report a player who isn't respecting it? ok, good bye league of legends



Edit2: Of course I'm losing my mind when somebody tells me to kill myself 6 times

replies.body:
#Edit 2: As personal attacks have continued after this message was pinned, this thread will now be locked.

**EDIT:** I'm pinning this comment along with a warning -- the tone of discussion in this thread is veering into the realm of personal attacks and insults. If this continues, the thread will be locked and moderator action may be taken.

----------------------------

1. File a support ticket. If you're calm, collected, and respectful, you may be able to get this punishment removed or reversed.
2. Do *not* repeat things other players say that violate the rules. Repeating "kys" is likely what triggered this punishment, as it is a *zero tolerance* phrase, meaning that *no* context is considered acceptable.
3. Even if another player *is* being toxic, do not resort to taunting them by telling them "banned" or "enjoy honor level 0." Be the bigger person, mute them, and report them.

quoting slurs is not ok fyi, nor is it ok to harass another player (kayn) for most of the game

>UnskiIIed Feeder: enjoy your honor level 0 and 14 days without playing league :F

you're not the first one to come on these boards after saying that btw
harass??

>UnskiIIed Feeder: ur toxic
UnskiIIed Feeder: banned :D
UnskiIIed Feeder: everyone report kayn he said "kys"
UnskiIIed Feeder: kayn

>UnskiIIed Feeder: kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: enjoy your honor level 0 and 14 days without playing league :F
UnskiIIed Feeder: you sure?
UnskiIIed Feeder: nah
UnskiIIed Feeder: not for so long
UnskiIIed Feeder: i will
UnskiIIed Feeder: if you report kayn for saying the "k phrase"

>Post-Game
UnskiIIed Feeder: report riven and kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: kayn said kys
UnskiIIed Feeder: our kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: he s a douche
UnskiIIed Feeder: so what?
UnskiIIed Feeder: if its normals you are albe to say "kys" to a random person and not getting banned 14 days?
UnskiIIed Feeder: able
UnskiIIed Feeder: no you are not
UnskiIIed Feeder: sorry kayn
UnskiIIed Feeder: :)

yes

harass
Yes, yes it is. "you are dumb" isn't for you to say if you do not understand that 1 report = 9 reports, number is pointless.

again, nobody is defending Kayn. it doesn't matter what he did. it doesn't matter if he got banned for it or not. he could already be banned for that slur. it still is irrelevant to your post.

he isn't the topic of this conversation. you are
WHAT PART OF "BANNING SOMEBODY WHO ENCOURAGES SUMMONERS TO REPORT THE BAD GUYS IS NOT OK" DONT YOU UNDERSTAND?

it's not your job to encourage summoners to do anything

when encountering a flamer your mission to dealing with it is ignore/mute >> report>> move on. 

that's all you have to do

if you do anything more then you are breaking the rules

I'm afraid you are the person mistaking how the system works.

There is no need to ask for reports as 1 report = 9 reports. It's purposely programmed that way to prevent premade teams from abusing that poor solo dude. So you repeating all that stuff just harms yourself.

That said, you can try to submit a ticket to https://support.riotgames.com and ask them to review the punishment. Depending on your behavioral history, they may change the punishment.

Regardless of what happens, do go asking for reports in the future, and especially don't go repeating zero tolerance phrases.
I know how it works, i just said that it is poorly designed ;)

>> [{quoted}](name=UnskiIIed Feeder,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=w40WwIQw,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-08T19:15:29.907+0000)
>
> yeah? fuck you and everyone in this shit community! 

i'd say it's designed perfectly fine...
your chatlog begs to differ
This is f'ing hilarious, seems i provide the information that 1 report = 9, then you say "fuck you and everyone in this shit community". You really do deserve that ban.

Yep i deserve a game ban for something i did in the chat, typical league of legends player with 50iq
And of course im insulting this community, you guys deserve it, defending somebody who harrassed me.
And that s the real harras: saying "kys" not encouraging people to report somebody who said it, that s not called harras.

Quote when literally anyone defended him? Encouraging people to report is harass, he harassed worse but you both harassed. "50 iq". This is actually amusing you dig a deeper and deeper hole. Nobody has sympathy for you, and thats what you came here for, so go now you will not be missed.
Keep on going with the sadboi train, more laughs on my end.

> 1 report isn't enough to get somebody banned.

Yes it is. 

Which is why calling for reports counts as harassment.

>you are dumb,

calling me names doesn't help your case

> i encouraged people to report a player who didnt respect the summoner's code, as i know 1 report isn't enough to get somebody banned.

then you are missinformed

it doesn't matter how many people report you. be it 1 report or 9, riot will only generate ONE investigation. if the player broke the rules then a punishment will follow. if not then no punishment

you could literally be reported by all 9 other players every time you join a game for the entirety of season 8 and you still wouldn't be banned if you did nothing wrong. mob justice is not a thing!
And what is wrong with saying that?

because quoting what someone else said and pointing a finger at him is not useful for winning the game. you're supposed to play the game, not preech how the ban system works and taunt other players with it

The report feature isn't there so you can taunt them with the system, rub their faces in it, or attempt to get everyone to alienate another player because you don't like what they did. 

It's there so you can report people.

I mean, if you got banned by a single instance like that then you have constantly acted toxic and already racked up penalties before. But ii do not believe that this is ban worthy in itself.

But expecting a 14 day ban on someone for saying "kys" is a bit delusional.

i got banned 14 days for nothing, why shouldn't he get banned for saying "kys"?
And I wasn't toxic AT ALL, this game was the most toxic i ve been on this account.

Seems convenient for your case here that you have been punished for nothing several times... I know, i have been punished for very little in this broken system before, but racking up an entire 14 day ban for "nothing" seems unlikely.

And technically, you also said "kys"
Yeah but it wasn't ment for anyone, and this is my first ban :)
Ofc it is your first ban, you can only get banned once. And we know the context, but the system decided you said "kys" and you must play by the systems rules.

>Ofc it is your first ban, you can only get banned once. 

that's technically innacurate

people have reformed before after the 2 week ban to the point they got it again a few times after some time

punishments are based on two questions:

Was he toxic?

Did he get punished recently and which punishment was it?

it's an easy rethoric to follow:

the 10 game chat restriction is based on wether you cared more about your ego than about the game.

the 25 game chat restriction is based on wether you cared more about your ego than about the game AND on wether you were already punished with a 10 game chat restr

the 2 week ban is based EITHER on wether you cared more about your ego than about the game AND on wether you were already punished with a 25 game chat restr
OR wether you used 0 tolerance slurs

the perma triggers if you are toxic after the two week ban. it doesn't matter how toxic. any type of negative behaviour will do, ranging from name calling, to score shaming, to harassment, to slurs

you are able to reform on the punishment ladder if you display no toxic behaviour after your last punishment. but it takes a while...

There has been instanced of old aggravating factors lasting over years on reformed players, so the system mustn't be that good. But what i mean't is that you can only be banned permanently once, as he said "this is my first ban" yet already admitted to a 14 day ban in one of my previous comments, so if we count both 14 day and permanent as bans that this be his second. Unless i misunderstood, i actually wish we would say "suspension" and "ban" to clarify which is which.

> [{quoted}](name=Astorine,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=w40WwIQw,comment-id=0002000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-08T19:28:16.172+0000)
>
> There has been instanced of old aggravating factors lasting over years on reformed players, so the system mustn't be that good. But what i mean't is that you can only be banned permanently once, as he said "this is my first ban" yet already admitted to a 14 day ban in one of my previous comments, so if we count both 14 day and permanent as bans that this be his second. Unless i misunderstood, i actually wish we would say "suspension" and "ban" to clarify which is which.


You are right, my bad, i should have called it suspension
There we go. But number of suspensions doesn't matter, how recent it was matters.

i'll have to but-in again because there's something to say about time:

the type of time that matters is **game time**

if you get a two week ban and then stop playing on the account for 3 years, when you return, you will still be at the same punishment level.

you need to play the game on the account without being toxic for the punishment level to drop
Thanks for the info, but get yer but outta here.

>why shouldn't he get banned for saying "kys"?

nobody said he shouldn't. but we're not discussing him in this post. we're discussing **YOU**

I implied that saying just "kys" then being silent would probably not get you a 14 day ban if you had no previous punishments. He deserved a punishment but that due to his repetitive negative behaviour and overuse of "kill your self"

>Astorine said he shouldn't, are you dumb?
"But expecting a 14 day ban on someone for saying "kys" is a bit delusional."

those two are not the same thing

> [{quoted}](name=Astorine,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=w40WwIQw,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-07-08T19:00:08.170+0000)
>
> I mean, if you got banned by a single instance like that then you have constantly acted toxic and already racked up penalties before. But ii do not believe that this is ban worthy in itself.
> 
> But expecting a 14 day ban on someone for saying "kys" is a bit delusional.

Kys is a zero tolerance word and it should result in instant 14 day ban straight after the game.
Seems that is only your opinion. (not that i have every once said "kys")

> [{quoted}](name=Astorine,realm=OCE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=w40WwIQw,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2018-07-08T19:08:54.320+0000)
>
> Seems that is only your opinion. (not that i have every once said "kys")

Its not my opinion. Go ahead, jump onto an account you don't care about. And say the word "KYS" a few times. I guarantee a ban.
That would be due to excessive toxic behaviour, i don't expect the word on its own would be the reason. And i have one account due to my hate for smurfs.

if you scroll down in the list of posts on these boards, you're bound to find at least 1 post about getting banned after saying **just that**.

(i.e. it was a few days ago but i dont remember when exactly and i can't be bothered enought to look for it just to prove you wrong)
You seem to want to prove me wrong, but i wont budge. Anyway we should keep this discussion about the op and his situation, just as the lil attention seeker wants.
it's not opinion. it's **fact**

Not too sure, but you do you.

It only seems to react that bad to words such as f****t, and nlgger.

and yet it's not the only way you can get a 2 week ban

for example if you are toxic after finishing the 25 game chat ban, there will also be a 2 week ban
